pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bonsai CLI==========A python library for making API calls to Bonsai BRAIN.Documentation for the Bonsai CLI can be found on the Bonsai Docs website.**Guide to CLI installation and usage:** https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/bonsai/cli/#installation**Full CLI Reference Documentation:** https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/bonsai/cli/Quick Installation------------------Install the latest stable from PyPI:`$ pip install bonsai-cli`Install the latest in-development version:`$ pip install https://github.com/BonsaiAI/bonsai-cli`
